actions.description: The star angler makes three Bite attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

name: Star Angler [VEoR]
senses: blindsight 120 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)

specialTraits.description: If the star angler is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails.
specialTraits.name: Avoidance

specialTraits.description: The star angler's lure sheds bright light in a 30- foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.
specialTraits.name: Illumination
